name: Out of Shape (Kiang, ingthing)
description:
Out of Shape

A simple shape-based puzzle game that quickly spirals out of hand...

Made for the GMTK Jam 2020 for the theme "Out of Control."

Team

Programming by mKiang
Art by ingthing 
Music by reckless150681

Hints:

You will need to use the 0 button, O button, and spacebar in order to complete this game.
